title: What Are WhatsApp Scams? Protect Yourself from Fraudsters
description: WhatsApp, a free messaging service owned by Facebook and popular around the world, is also a popular target for fraudsters. How to guard against attack.
author: Emily Long

title: What Is The CAN-SPAM Act? Understand The Anti-Spam Law
description: The CAN-SPAM Act gives guidance about what businesses can and can't do when sending commercial email. Understand how the law protects you.
author: Kate Dore

title: What Are Malware Bots: Malicious Spiders, Crawlers and Web Bots
description: Malware bots are a kind of bot, or
that does complicated repetitive tasks and can be used to take over your computer.
author: Emily Long

title: How To Spot An Online Survey Scam
description: Online surveys often promise cash for filling out information, but are they legit? Here's how you can tell real offers from bogus claims.
author: Sheila Olson

title: What Are Medicare Scams? How Seniors Are Targeted by Fraudsters
description: Fraudsters try to get Medicare numbers and other personal information to file false claims or steal your identity. How to defend against this scam.
author: Kim Porter
